title: chicken caesar salad wrap
directions: In a medium bowl, combine caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, pepper, and lemon juice. Add the romaine lettuce, cubed chicken and salad croutons. Toss until coated well.
Place about ⅔ of the chicken mixture into each wrap and roll up.
ingredients: ¾ cup lite Caesar Salad Dressing
2 cups cubed cooked chicken breast (Tyson grilled and ready worked great!)
2 cups romaine lettuce (I used the premium with shredded carrots)
4 whole grain whole grain wraps (or tortillas)
